sentences.sContent: A clumsy waiter spilled wine all over her new skirt.
sentences.sCn: 一名笨手笨脚的服务员把葡萄酒洒得她新裙子上到处都是。

sentences.sContent: a clumsy attempt to catch the ball

remMethod.val: c+lum(亮度)+sy→没有亮光，不灵光→笨拙的

trans.tranOther: moving or doing things in a careless way, especially so that you drop things, knock into things etc
